about_the_game:
In Scandinavian mythology, Valhalla is the spirit world for deceased warriors who, at the moment of their death, did not let go of their weapons. You have the right to decide who you want to be. You might be a soldier, or wizard, or an archer. Create your team, explore the dungeons and new territories. This world is full of secrets. Let’s see how you fare in the fight!

Main Features:


  • Decide what kind of cast you will play for

In the world of Valhalla, you can be a soldier, a wizard, or an archer. Many unique abilities to choose from will be your weapon against enemies. You may be a wizard with a weapon of a soldier or be an archer with a wizard’s power - it’s up to you!

  • Open world, various dungeons and creatures

Explore the world, enter portals, and visit unique dungeons. Open the chests and get new items and weapons

  • Free to play

Download and enjoy the game for free! This is a world of mystery and adventure.

  • Create your own team

Recruit travelers you meet on your way. They’ll be with you until you let them go, or they die. Your companion might be an archer, a tank, a wizard or somebody else. They will help you to battle enemies and perform a variety of tasks. With each level, you can recruit more allies, but the number of them should not be more than four.

  • Fight, conquer and defend territories

Conquer new territories and defend them fighting with the enemies. Fight dangerous monsters, expand your territory, and improve your skills.

Join the game and embark on an epic journey into the heart of adventure in Valhalla – where heroes are made and legends come to life!

name: RPG non RPG: Valhalla

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: intel/AMD CPU with SSE2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card with Directx 10 or higher support
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: intel/AMD CPU with SSE2
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card with Directx 10 or higher support
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Dive into "RPG non RPG: Valhalla", an action RPG, adventure, and casual genre blend. Explore the mystical realms of Valhalla, uncovering secrets in ancient dungeons. Choose your class for unique abilities. Engage in strategic gameplay and immerse yourself in a Norse-inspired world.
